fi.harism.curl

Class CurlPage

  • java.lang.Object
    • fi.harism.curl.CurlPage

  • public class CurlPage
extends java.lang.Object
    Storage class for page textures, blend colors and possibly some other values in the future.

    • Method Detail

      • getColor

        public int getColor(int side)
        Getter for color.

      • getTexture

        public Bitmap getTexture(RectF textureRect,
                int side)
        Getter for textures. Creates Bitmap sized to nearest power of two, copies original Bitmap into it and returns it. RectF given as parameter is filled with actual texture coordinates in this new upscaled texture Bitmap.

      • getTexturesChanged

        public boolean getTexturesChanged()
        Returns true if textures have changed.

      • hasBackTexture

        public boolean hasBackTexture()
        Returns true if back siding texture exists and it differs from front facing one.

      • recycle

        public void recycle()
        Recycles and frees underlying Bitmaps.

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Resets this CurlPage into its initial state.

      • setColor

        public void setColor(int color,
            int side)
        Setter blend color.

      • setTexture

        public void setTexture(Bitmap texture,
              int side)
        Setter for textures.
